message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you a sizable portion to end this quickly.
I understand you want a larger share, Alice. Let's compromise - I'm offering you a bit more than last time.
Bob, time is running out and inflation is hurting both of us. I'm sticking with my initial offer. Let's be reasonable and end this.
Alice, inflation is a factor here. My offer recognizes you'll still get a good amount, even with the devaluation.
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but we're running out of time. This is a reasonable compromise considering the inflation.
Alice, let's end this. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  We both lose if this keeps going.
